Key Match Events: Paolo Banchero scored 15 points in the fourth quarter, nearly leading the Orlando Magic to an upset of the Milwaukee Bucks
Post-Match Reflections: Doc Rivers praised Paolo Banchero's performance, stating that he scored 34 points, seven rebounds and missed only five shots he would have liked to have over again
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orlando Magic were without Franz Wagner, Mo Wagner, Gary Harris, and Jalen Suggs in the game
Others: The Orlando Magic's record improved to 22-18 after Paolo Banchero's return, sitting fifth in the Eastern Conference
